CCAPI.BrokerInterface
Class ConsorsConnection

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      CCAPI.BrokerInterface.ConsorsConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ConsorsConnection
extends java.lang.Thread

Connects to consors server - direct! Consors uses a plain https request model to trade. (Which is good and secure.) Thus, the client sends requests and gets an immediate response! Session TANs are for security reasons, not supported!

Author:
us
